forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms during the morning followed by occasional showers this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain diminishing to a few showers in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High around 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
